name: contextual-testing
description: Use the same end-to-end tests to run context-based validations (e.g., accessibility, functional, visual, etc.)

scripts.test:accessibility: export TEST_CONTEXT=accessibility && npm run pretest && protractor conf.js
scripts.test:functional: export TEST_CONTEXT=functional && npm run pretest && protractor conf.js
scripts.test:visual: export TEST_CONTEXT=visual && npm run pretest && protractor conf.js
